languages.text: {n}Наметанный глаз сразу замечает, что кто-то изуродовал труп после смерти. Вы и сами {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}не раз{/d} так делали, обманывая слуг закона.{/n}

{n}Your practised eye instantly notices that the corpse was mutilated posthumously. You have resorted to such ruses yourself on a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}number of occasions{/d} when you needed to trick some servants of the law.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dein geübtes Auge erkennt sofort, dass die Leiche nach ihrem Tod verstümmelt wurde. Du hast selbst schon {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}mehrere Male{/d} auf ähnliche Tricks zurückgegriffen, um Diener des Gesetzes in die Irre zu führen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your practised eye instantly notices that the corpse was mutilated posthumously. You have resorted to such ruses yourself on a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}number of occasions{/d} when you needed to trick some servants of the law.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dein geübtes Auge erkennt sofort, dass die Leiche nach ihrem Tod verstümmelt wurde. Du hast selbst schon {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}mehrere Male{/d} auf ähnliche Tricks zurückgegriffen, um Diener des Gesetzes in die Irre zu führen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre œil exercé remarque immédiatement que le cadavre a été mutilé à titre posthume. Vous avez vous-même eu recours à de telles ruses {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}à plusieurs reprises{/d} pour tromper des représentants de la loi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your practised eye instantly notices that the corpse was mutilated posthumously. You have resorted to such ruses yourself on a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}number of occasions{/d} when you needed to trick some servants of the law.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre œil exercé remarque immédiatement que le cadavre a été mutilé à titre posthume. Vous avez vous-même eu recours à de telles ruses {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}à plusieurs reprises{/d} pour tromper des représentants de la loi.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu experiencia te revela que este cadáver fue mutilado póstumamente. Has recurrido a esta artimaña en {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}diversas ocasiones{/d}, cuando necesitabas engañar a algunos agentes de la ley.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your practised eye instantly notices that the corpse was mutilated posthumously. You have resorted to such ruses yourself on a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}number of occasions{/d} when you needed to trick some servants of the law.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu experiencia te revela que este cadáver fue mutilado póstumamente. Has recurrido a esta artimaña en {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}diversas ocasiones{/d}, cuando necesitabas engañar a algunos agentes de la ley.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの鋭い眼は、死体が死後に切断されたことをすぐに見抜く。あなた自身、法の従者を欺かなければならなかった時、このような策略を使う{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}機会は何度も{/d}あった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your practised eye instantly notices that the corpse was mutilated posthumously. You have resorted to such ruses yourself on a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}number of occasions{/d} when you needed to trick some servants of the law.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの鋭い眼は、死体が死後に切断されたことをすぐに見抜く。あなた自身、法の従者を欺かなければならなかった時、このような策略を使う{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}機会は何度も{/d}あった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你老练的目光立刻注意到：这具尸体是在死后才遭到肢解的。你自己也{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}多次{/d}用过这样的伎俩，欺骗法务部门的仆人。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your practised eye instantly notices that the corpse was mutilated posthumously. You have resorted to such ruses yourself on a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}number of occasions{/d} when you needed to trick some servants of the law.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你老练的目光立刻注意到：这具尸体是在死后才遭到肢解的。你自己也{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}多次{/d}用过这样的伎俩，欺骗法务部门的仆人。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deneyimli gözlerin, cesedin ölüm sonrasında yaralandığını anında fark ediyor. Kanunların hizmetkârlarını kandırman gereken {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}birkaç hadisede{/d} sen de böylesi numaralara başvurmuştun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your practised eye instantly notices that the corpse was mutilated posthumously. You have resorted to such ruses yourself on a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}number of occasions{/d} when you needed to trick some servants of the law.{/n}
